Today, Dan and Jordan continue looking into the past to follow Alex Jones' path downward after [[The Sandy Hook Elementary Massacre|Sandy Hook]]. In this installment, [[Steve Pieczenik]] finally shows up on the scene to mix things up, and Alex reveals what's at "the bottom of the rabbit hole."
